attributes.additional_details:
(land off Sandbrooke lane, Moreton, Wirral)
Fernbank farm has been a small livery yard for over 40 years, with many of the same people still here.
the council want to sell our beloved farm land to developers, turning one of the last plots of green into more houses. Its not just the people here and their horses that will be affect but the whole community, with over crowed school, more traffic etc. Please help us to save our little farm by signing and sharing this petition.
